document_data.name: Myth Adofhaer
document_data.mainbody: '''Myth Adofhaer''', formerly known as '''Adofhaeranede''', was a ''[[mythal]]''-cloaked [[sun elf]] city in the ancient realm of [[Siluvanede]] (founded c. {{Yearlink|-8400}}) in the [[High Forest]].

History.Legacy:
Even by the 14{{th}} century, a number of old songs written in the [[Elven language]] told of the ''mythal''-cloaked Siluvanedenn city of Myth Adofhaer.

By [[1374 DR]], it was being rumored that an old book had recently been uncovered in a ruined Eaerlanni library, purportedly telling of Myth Adofhaer's exile and, more importantly, the conditions by which it might return. This information was of particular interest to the [[Eldreth Veluuthra]], the organization that sought the removal of all [[human]]s from Faer√ªn. They hoped the sun elves would share their anger at the loss of elven might, and hunted for the book.

document_data.Stasis: The entire city and all its citizens were placed in magical stasis by the power of its ''mythal''. It was effectively removed from the world until certain conditions were met.
